name: Chronic Kidney Disease, Evidence of Volume Overload Today
shortname: Does patient have evidence of volume overload today (Edema, Crackles, Dyspnea)
description: If yes, start furosemide 20mg po bid after confirming there is no hypokalemia (low K)

name: Chronic Kidney Disease, Patient on Enalapril
description: Enalapril 5mg po daily for stage 2 CKD or worse

name: Chronic Kidney Disease, Last i0stat Checked Date
Chronic Kidney Disease, Any Abnormalities
shortname: Any abnormalities (what is the trend of Cr and K)
description: Should check istat q3months if on diuretics and if not on diuretics q6 months to trend Cr
